评论详情: Fits true to size.  Flattering for those of us who are thick in the middle. Dry fit material is very breathable.

评论概述: Grape color is actually blue but it's a nice shirt
评论详情: I ordered 2 other style shirts from this company.  The medium in 2 styles was a bit more fitted than I like so I had to return them and order up a size.  So when I ordered this one, I ordered the large and it looks a bit too big on me.  I ordered the "grape" color but it's definetly not as pictured, closer to a blue.  The shirt is on the long side which is nice if you don't want your buns to fully be visible in your leggings.  The neck is a bit wide but I'm sure it's due to the larger size.  Sleeves have plenty of room.  The design is different, very comfortable.  So other than the color being off for "grape" and me apparently being between 2 sizes for this company, I like their shirts.

5’3” 148 lbs  36 bust. Med.  Great workout shirt. Color is as shown, wash nicely and did partial dry in the dryer. No shrinkage.  A little longer than I like, hits just below the butt on me. Fabric is light and not tight around the bust. The flare gives a fitted look without the clinging at the waist.

I have several different styles of the Kimmery exercise tops and I think this may be my favorite. I ordered the light blue and it’s very pretty. I ordered a size up as my regular size would be snug per their size guide. It’s loose without being baggy. I love the length as it covers most of my hips. I wore it today for a walk in hot, humid weather. The fabric performed like it was supposed to, wicking all the sweat away.

评论概述: Top looked great out of the package then puckered after washing
评论详情: I love the color of this top...beautiful jewel tone purple and it fit very well when I tried it on out of the package.  It curves slightly at the waist and the stitching accentuates a woman's curves which is very flattering.  I always wash clothes before wearing and I washed this in cold on the gentle cycle and hung it to dry as I do with all my workout clothing, and it puckered along the stitching lines.  I loved this top and would have purchased all the colors that I like but now I am not sure if this is just a problem with this top or if all of them pucker when washed.  Not sure about getting more of these.  I am undecided.
I picked this top to wear with joggers and it's a really good choice. It's breathable and very comfortable with a nice drape. I've worn it several times and it washes beautifully.

This is a nice top, good color.  It's a bit thicker than I had expected, and the cut is a little wide for me.  I'm not a small woman, more curvy, and while it fits the top well (including the arms), it flows out in such a way that it ends up being more baggy than fit.  All that being said, I wear it regularly and it works well.
This top is very comfortable and on the longer side if you want to cover your rear while working out. Can't beat it for the price.
This is my second time buying this shirt.  The stitching adds a nice touch.  The shirt wears well and launders nicely.
The asymmetrical hem is annoying. Why does a normal person need an extra six inches of fabric to cover her buttocks?

I love this top!  It's a stylish top in a wicking fabric, so I stay comfortable on hot, humid days.  It's the first top in a cooling fabric that isn't a glorified tee shirt.  I love the length, and my husband says I should buy it in another color.  The only reason that I didn't give it five stars is because it's only hand washable.

评论概述: Fits to regular size for me... colors are not as vibrant as product page
评论详情: I have quite a few of the Kimmery Brand shirts and this is the first short sleeve one I have ordered. The fit is just like the sleeveless and the long sleeve for me and I particularly like them for the length. I generally wear them around town, not just for working out although running errands is in itself, is a workout.  The color purple is not anything like shown in the photo, it's more of a soft lavender shade which reminds me of Easter eggs. The color on this shirt is way off even though most of their colors are pretty much right on target. Good quality, they release moisture well and look good for any occasion. I generally wear this under a photographer's pocket vest and it looks nice and casual. I will purchase a few more.

This is a wonderful top, dressy but casual. I loved wearing it but inadvertently, left it at my granddaughters and since we wear the same size I'm sure I'll never see it again. She's probably tried to wear it out already. Guess I need to order another one. 🥰

评论概述: Good tops to run around in
评论详情: Love the longer length (I’m 5’8”). Fabric is lightweight but not see through. I have a few Kimmery tops in different colors and styles and am happy with them.
Love these tops. Fit well and live the length. Great with leggings. They wash well and great for the hot humid weather in Florida. I bought 3 so far and absolutely love them.
Excellent for and style

I order two and although they are supposed to be a large, the blue one is noticeably smaller. The almost black one runs true to size. For reference I am 5’3” and normally wear a size 8. I probably would upsize to an extra large if ordering again.
I bought this for a workout top but decided it was a tunic, so I could use it every day also.  Very comfortable.  True to size.  Either way it's a plus!!
This top is very nice, very comfy, fits nicely, but the hem seem came loose right away to the point I had to rehem it. Other than that its a nice shirt

评论概述: Inconsistent Sizing Between Colors, But a Fabulous Shirt! Need More Colors
评论详情: I bought this shirt in black first, then added 4 more colors! PLEASE MAKE A WHITE ONE!!! The first shirt fit the best. The light blue and grayish black seem to run larger. Wish they fit like the solid black one. Very flattering for those with hips. Washes up nicely and doesn't really wrinkle. Have thrown in dryer on low.
Exactly as the title states. That’s why I kept all three of them. Colors are good also.
Terrific for exercise class.  Fabric is soft and comfortable, nice and long, and wrinkle free.  Have bought 3 so far.

I prefer looser clothing when exercising rather than skin-tight. I like this shirt for the stretchiness and the length. It's not too thin, either. I use it for yoga and riding my bike.  The color was accurate to the picture.
Great for workout, length covers booty
I bought four of these shirts. Easy to wash and dry, light weight and comfortable. Great to travel with, stylish, and attractive.
It’s cute. Read the reviews after I ordered but it turned out better than some of the reviews I read.  Doesn’t fit as loose as I thought it would but it’ll serve it’s purpose.
The black one is my third purchase of this brand/style. And I love them.
N/a
The shirts fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable.
This shirt is pretty and fits well. I'm not sure I would do any physical exercise in it because the material feels like a satin material. However, it will look good with capris.
I love the color, the material and the fit. It has a good length also. I bought a blue one also. Definitely will buy these again in more colors.
these tops are very comfortable and appealing, love the stretch and the colors and lovely..

评论概述: Soft green color, work-out material, easy wash care.
评论详情: Material is perfect for working out, easy wash care, and I love the soft green color.
Love the look, color and feel, have ordered two more in different colors.

评论概述: Nice everyday and exercise, yoga, biking shirt
评论详情: I like to get up and put on something comfortable that I can later go do my work out in which lately is biking or yoga.  I have several UA shirts (M) that are listed as semi fitted that I had purchased sometime ago for the same purpose, but found myself never wearing because they are too tight in the arms and shoulders, and just a tad long in the neck line.  These shirts fit perfectly, neck line is modest without being TOO high or low, shirts have a long hem, that I can leave down, or tuck the front in a little if I want to look "leaner" that day.  I'm 5'5", 135 lbs, with femininely muscular arms and shoulders! and the M fit me perfect.

I am 5'4", 135 lb. with a little bit of a middle-age tummy, and the medium fits well, even slightly on the looser side (I worried from the reviews whether I should 'size up' and am glad I did not).  The top covers my butt and the short sleeves are long enough to cover that middle-age upper arm thing.  The material is nice.  With tops like this I wash them in cold water and hang them to dry - this fabric looks like it will dry quickly.I plan to get at least another one of these in a different color.  I got the 'grape' color, which is a marled fabric.

评论概述: The grape color is a blue
评论详情: Thinking about keeping or returning. It is cute on, comfortable but the grape color is not grape it is a blue.  Dye lots ? Computer screen color?

评论概述: Cute Zig-Zag Stitching And Longer Length Are Flattering
评论详情: I purchased this Kimmery Yoga top in Large and Medium. I am usually a medium, but a Large fit almost too snug across the chest. I’m sure the XL would have not been flattering. I stretch it out on a chair back in between wearing it. I got the light pink and a black bra is visible through it, but this is my preferred shade of pink.  I like the length and the zig-zag stitching is figure-flattering.

I bought this for group workout classes, yoga, etc.  I like that it is a little longer than some tops and it doesn't cling....makes for a more flattering silhouette, which is what I was hoping for!!  I am almost 5'7" and weigh 172 lb.  The large fit perfectly!

评论概述: Love it, I had to buy another color.
评论详情: This is a good quality shirt, thick enough that it doesn’t show your bra lines. Light enough to work out in. And I love that for a chubby woman it hides the unflattering elements. The blue color is very nice and I just got a purple one since I really did like the first shirt.

Awesome too.  Very flattering.  I have ordered one and it look so good that I ordered another one in a different color and it’s look good too.  Going to order two more.  I have washed them both and they still look good after the wash.  Feels very comfortable and top is true to size.  Has a slendering effect.  Highly recommend
love it everything about it

The laundering instructions said to not machine dry… 🤷‍♀️ Just washed and dried it (I think it’s polyester so if you left it in there for an hour and a half it might melt) and it came out perfect!  This is a nice, short-sleeved work out tee that covers the bum... as I mentioned, I think it’s polyester so it would not be a great marathon tea or something breathable when spending hours outdoors. I am 5’6”, 160 lbs. and ordered the large to have A loose fit over leggings… I plan to order additional colors…👍🏻
Love the longer length.

评论概述: Cute style.  Love the sleeve length and overall longer length.
评论详情: Love this cute green tee because of the longer length and slightly longer sleeves.  It's versatile.  I've worn it to the gym, golf course and to lunch.  I am an older woman, 5'8'' tall/weight 160 so ordered XL.  This green color fit perfectly.  The sleeves are terrific as they don't creep up your armpits while working out.  The black XL is too small.  If there was consistency in the products and materials I would order more colors but will look elsewhere for now.
the transaction and product were good!!
I ordered up a size as per other reviews and it worked out well. I like the length. It's comfortable and this gray color goes with almost any leggings.

评论概述: Comfortable for Regular Exercise and leisure travel
评论详情: This shirt is what I use while exercising and also while out and about.  It is comfortable, stretches as I do (and that's quite telling, since I'm also wearing this while mowing on a Tractor).  I don't feel any binding at all, and it stands up to machine washing and drying.

Really like this shirt. Soft and flattering. Long enough to help hide my booty. The design is cute. The only thing is the stitching on the front has come loose in a couple of spots.  I have worn and washed the shirt three or four times already. It could've been pulled by my cat, I am just not sure, but the design on the shirt seems a little fragile. Overall, I really like it, and I ordered it in another color.
Hides tummy flaws and covers nicely for workouts and gardening.  Will look to see if comes in other colors and my size.

I bought 7 of these shirts. They are all beautiful and fit so nicely. However, each one has the same, terrible flaw. The defect is in the label. The label is sewn onto the shirt on both ends of the tag with clear nylon thread. These threads are incredibly sharp and irritating. I had to unpick each stitch and carefully remove the clear, difficult to see threads from each shirt. Sometimes the shirt stitching gets caught in my unpicking and threatens to unravel the shirt's seam. The shirt is unwearable without the tag being removed and removing the tag is really difficult, requiring a seam ripper and magnifying glasses.

Bought in 2 colors from same company and there was a price difference which was a little weird as they are the exact same top except different colors. However, prices were very fair compared to other company tops. I'm 5'2-1/2" and 126 lbs. (want to lose 6-8 lbs.). They basically fit just fine and I'm happy with them. If I'm being picky, my hips are little big compared to my top half so in a perfect world would have liked a "scosh" more room at the hip. If I lose the 6 lbs. they'll be perfect!
I bought one of these in another color and loved it so much I purchased two more in different colors!

评论概述: Great top if you like see through tops
评论详情: Great colour great design great fit only problem is you can see straight through it all these tops or so share and thin you can see literally straight through them which now I have to buy like a vest or something to put over it

This Josh’s wife Kayla: It fits me nice, washes well, is long enough that I am not showing off what I don’t want to. I am 5 8 and 240lbs, i ordered the 2x and I am happy with it. Also it is wrinkle free. Stains do tend to stand out on it but the stains wash out well. Like I just said I am pretty happy with it.
Very flattering. A tad on the big size. The colors are very nice. Will order another one in a different size.

评论概述: Comfy and looks ok. Will be good for walking.
评论详情: The stitching would look better if it were either lighter or darker than the shirt.
Lightweight, comfortable, cool, and washes well.  I ordered a second one.
This is a great shirt but I felt that it runs a little small.

The color, grape, is a lovely deep purplish blue. Not navy but not really purple either. The fit is superb. I ordered an XL due to my broad shoulders. This can make the body of the shirt hang too loose but this was just right. Fit through the bust and slight flare at waist gives you an hourglass shape - even if you haven't got one!

I do Pilates and/or aerobic exercise 6 times per week.  This is the 6th top I have bought from Kimmery.  The tops are long enough to cover my bum and wash like a dream.  I have washed these tops around 20 times with no problem.  The short sleeves allow for freedom of movement .  The length allows me to run errands without ‘flashing’ too much after my workout.  Wish you had more colors!

These are great shirts but FIT TIGHT. I like that they are long. I ordered a size bigger, and THANK GOODNESS I did. I figured a yoga shirt would fit tighter. It was a great shirt for golfing in. Light and cool.

评论概述: Perfect for work and cute too!
评论详情: 150 pounds 5'3", shirt large. I bought a large for work. I work in physical rehab so I needed a cute shirt that is comfy and one I can move around easily in. It's long, goes past my hips, but that's perfect for work as it covers my behind when I bend over. Whenever I wear it I get compliments!! Love this shirt!

I can wear a L top, I normally buy XL tops because I like them loose, I don't want anything tight.  I ordered this in a XXL so it would be oversized and cover my rear when wearing leggings to work out.  This top is TINY. The XXL fits me like a L top would fit and it does NOT cover my rear.  I'm 5'4 so I don't know if the top I got is just sized wrong, but it certainly is not a XXL.

评论概述: Love the length and fit of these
评论详情: Love these so much I keep ordering more. Long enough sleeves to cover any under arm razor burn, and long enough to cover your most of your backside if your leggings are having that sheer when you squat problem. Also light weight enough to be cool but not sheer. Don’t order a size up, unlike most gym clothes these are true to size and not clingy. I’m 5’7, 150lb and the medium was perfect. Probably the best workout shirts I have ever owned.
This shirt is comfortable and silky and loose fitting. I’ll definitely purchase another one in another color.
After receiving one top I went back and ordered several others in different colors and in long sleeve these are very nice for the gym and they are long enough to cover my bottom when wearing leggings

my regular size would have been ok if it were just an everyday top but a tad small for something I would workout in. I ordered a size up and it's perfect. The fabric feels fine, a poly spandex so no shrinking. I like it very much.

评论概述: Lightweight, soft, comfortable material in a relaxed but flattering style
评论详情: Super soft material, very lightweight and comfortable to work out in. I'm still in the "losing weight" phase of my workout journey, and these shirts help make me feel less self-conscious as they don't cling awkwardly in places you don't want them to. The last thing anyone needs while working out is to feel self conscious about ill-fitting/too tight uncomfortable clothing! These are also the PERFECT length if you like to wear leggings as they are a big longer. Got two of these and will be buying more.

评论概述: Didn’t fit (I needed the next size up)
评论详情: I really liked the style and color, it just wasn’t as loose fitting as I hoped it would be.  Other than that it’s really nice! Look

评论概述: Runs at least a FULL SIZE SMALL
评论详情: Nice shirt but I had to order a full size up and even then, I could have used a bit more looseness.  But, it covers my rear when I'm wearing my leggings and it's a cute style.  I am usually an extra large but I ordered XXL as suggested by others.
Wife love it, she wants more in different colors

I love this shirt for working out because of the great quality and lightness (but not thinness) of the material.  The colors are unique due to the pattern but simple enough to go with lots of plain shorts/leggings.  I've ordered two now.  May get more.  I'm 5'11" tall and it is long enough to cover my behind.
I love the material these tops are made of, they’re so light and airy.  Great for working out or running errands in the heat.  Very comfy and I think they look great.  Good product!
Perfect fit. Nice cut

评论概述: Definitely glad I ordered up in size
评论详情: I usually wear a large to extra large because I don't like clingy shirts and I figured I would try xxl, and definitely glad that I did, it fits nice and seems very flattering! The black is in a deep black, but still works for me! 😄

评论概述: -Pretty color -Fabric keeps me cool during my workout Cons
评论详情: Pros: -Pretty color -Fabric keeps me cool during my workout  Cons: -Boxy and unflattering -Sleeves and hem are starting to unravel after about a month of wearing it and washing it once a week. I use a gentle wash cycle and hang dry it
I bought my usual size. Very small.  Pretty tho
As described, good fit, flattering style and shape. Wouldn’t hesitate to purchase additional items from this seller.

评论概述: Fits a little big on the shoulder
评论详情: I don’t love this. I bought the large because I didn’t want it tight on the waist and it fits great at the waist but it fits a little weird at the shoulder. Like maybe it’s for a broader shoulder. It just makes me feel like my body is awkward. My bust is bigger after having a baby so that may be why it fits weird? I don’t know.

评论概述: Ran large, but still worth keeping
评论详情: Nice fabric. Wore this for a long backpacking trip and it was great at wicking away moisture to where I felt comfortable throughout. My only issue was the sizing seemed larger than expected.
Nice shirt but fits quite big. I knew it was supposed to be a bit loose, which is honestly why i bought it to be a postpartum workout shirt. But it is much bigger than I expected
You can either wear this top for every day or for dress. It lays just right with no wrinkles at all. Soft to the touch. I love it!

评论概述: Nice top to wear on hot days
评论详情: I got one too small the first order, so returned it and got a larger one which fits great!  Washes good and wears good.

评论概述: Great shirt - gives me comfort and confidence
评论详情: Love the shirt! Great color, great styling. Fabric is soft, nice drape, but sturdy. Breathes nicely. Cut is PERFECT! Great length - gives me confidence that it won't lift above my stomach no matter what moves my Pilates or Yoga instructor has in store for me. Allows me to focus on my form and my workout without having to worry about wardrobe failure.

I love this top so so much! It’s comfortable and flattering, looks great and comes in so many different colors! I actually wear this to work with my scrubs and it works great. Super breathable and doesn’t show your “rolls”. It’s worth $20!
Fits as expected but it is too long. I will have to remember it.

评论概述: Fit great, look great. Could be a bit softer.
评论详情: The tops are great; I only wish they were of a softer cotton. I should have read about the materials before buying.
I am tall and this top is long enough (but not too long) to look right over pants.  A little loose fitting, which I like.
Love them
I am disappointed it is not a true black..
Fits well, a little roomy but acceptable.  Washes well although I hang these tops rather than putting them in the dryer.  Color is nice.  Very satisfied with quality

评论概述: Great top for casual wear or gym workput
评论详情: Very flattering,  washes and dries like a dream
I was pleased, just what I ordered. Nice to Wear when working out, walking, running, etc...
This top is a bit too tight, especially if you're a busty woman.  But, it's very comfortable to wear.  I wish it was a little more roomier.

评论概述: Goodbye again in a larger size
评论详情: Was a great top just ran too small for me
I like it will wear it when it’s warmer out

Color lighter then pictured. Still loved it. Fit well very flattering. I order 2 on different colors. The other one came with threads pulled on stitching in front returned that one kept this one. After wearing one time same area stitching pulled. Will keep but disappointed.

评论概述: It is easy to put on if you have limited shoulder movement
评论详情: Its comfortable, and looks good
Was a little tight around the tummy
